name: Project One
description: First try to create a project :)

target_roles.title: satellite engineer
target_roles.description: Satellite engineers develop, test and oversee the manufacture of satellite systems and satellite programmes. They may also develop software programs, collect and research data, and test the satellite systems. Satellite engineers can also develop systems to command and control satellites. They monitor satellites for issues and report on the behaviour of the satellite in orbit.

quality standards
types of satellites
engineering processes
adjust engineering designs
geostationary satellites
troubleshoot
monitor satellites

use technical drawing software
unmanned air systems

launching of satellites into orbit
global navigation satellite system performance parameters
